name: Space Dwarf - Updated Version
description:
Dave the space-dwarf was min(e)ding his own business until he got lost in an irradiated cave.

Fight yourself through waves of enemys as you proceed deeper and deeper into the cave. With every wave of enemys you survive, you unlock upgrades and get stronger. How long can you survive?

He found a weapon to fight the countless creatures of the dark. But somehow his body starts to react to the uranium deep in the cave... Will he ever return to the surface?

Each level is randomly generated!

This is the post-jam updated version, still the windows version has better graphics and performance, you can download the game here: https://desertmawgames.itch.io/space-dwarf-download-updated
